item.description:
Kelly Duffy, a longtime friend and Active Meetup Member is moving to AZ with her daughter very soon! We want to send her off with Good luck wishes and lots of High spirit and cheer.

Please join us:

Date:Sunday July 29, 2012

Time:5pm until ?

Where:  Derryfield in Manchester NH

DECK PARTY.

Music:  Starting @ 6:30pm The "Josh Logan Trio"

Please note.  The Deck is open from 8AM on and no Reservations are allowed.  Therefore, seating is FIFO.

What to bring:  BIG SMILES AND LOTS OF GOOD WISHES!

 

SPREAD THE WORD TO OTHER MEETUPS AND FRIENDS.  I DO NOT KNOW ALL OF KELLY'S FRIENDS SO WILL POST ON FACEBOOK AND PRIVATE EMAILS.  FEEL FREE TO DO THE SAME.

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: FAREWELL and GODspeed to KELLY DUFFY & DAUGHTER - DERRYFIELD DECK PARTY
